meanings: (돈 등을) (내기 등에) bet, (계약금·보증금 등을) deposit, (현상금을) offer (a prize for sth), (사업·도박 등에) risk, stake
(목숨·명예 등을) risk (one's life), stake (sth on sth)
at the risk of one´s life
pick on, find fault with, pounce on, make an issue (out) of

meanings.meaning: put/lay your head/neck on the block
